summary: This bill, the Accelerating the Development of Advanced Psychology Trainees Act (ADAPT Act), aims to expand access to psychological mental and behavioral health services for Medicare, Medicaid, and CHIP beneficiaries. It allows for reimbursement of services provided by supervised psychology trainees, defining 'advanced psychology trainee' and specifying supervision requirements. The bill mandates the development of a billing modifier code and provides guidance to states on overcoming barriers to coverage for services provided by these trainees under Medicaid and CHIP.
